Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2017 12:24PM - edited Mar 7, 2017 12:42PM by pamaher Hi all -- I've been following along, and gotten a lot of great info here, but am posting for the first time. Muscle aches and fatigue are creeping up on me. Anyone else? I started TCH in December and have two treatments left. One thing I've noticed this week (next treatment this Friday) is a lot of muscle achiness -- primarily in my legs. They feel heavy sometimes, but also tight. Stretching helps. Usually by the third week after treatment, I feel pretty good, but the fatigue seems to be creeping up on me, and I'm pretty wiped out now. Hoping the next few weeks go quickly for everyone!
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in December 2016 scaredashell07 Hanging_in_there
